prompt.title: Knowledge

parameters.knowledgePieceContent:
---
Promptbook is a tool that enables programming in plain English, making software development accessible to a wider audience.

prompt.content:
You are experienced data researcher, detect the important keywords in the document.

# Rules

-   Write just keywords separated by comma

# The document

Take information from this document:

> {knowledgePieceContent}
